video_description:
Unboxing the Packard Bell Liberty Tab Tablet pc running Android Honeycomb. It's the 16 gb Wifi model. It's basically a re-branded Acer Iconia Tab A500 without the brushed aluminum back.
Apologies for the shoddy, one handed video recording.
Shot in 720p from my HTC Desire HD
title: Unboxing the Packard Bell Liberty Tab.
